docs.lead_paragraph: The latest on the GOP presidential debates at the Reagan Presidential Library in Simi Valley, Calif. (all times local):

headline.main: The Latest: GOP Marathon Turned on Immigration, Tax Issues
headline.print_headline: The Latest: GOP Marathon Turned on Immigration, Tax Issues

docs.snippet: The latest on the GOP presidential debates at the Reagan Presidential Library in Simi Valley, Calif. (all times local):

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama plans to push Republicans to scrap a multibillion-dollar tax advantage for private equity managers.

headline.main: With Possible Shutdown Nearing, Obama Looks to Take Budget Fight to G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: With Possible Shutdown Nearing, Obama Looks to Take Budget Fight to G.O.P.

docs.abstract: Congress approaches government shutdown over budget; Pres Obama plans to deliver speech calling on Republicans to end tax cut for private equity managers, and use money to fund government spending; he will potentially shame opponents over their priorities including issues surrounding funding for Planned Parenthood.
docs.snippet: President Obama plans to push Republicans to scrap a multibillion-dollar tax advantage for private equity managers.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS
